title: HPI 49 - Well Qualified - the Jains on Truth
itunes:title: HPI 49 - Well Qualified - the Jains on Truth
description: Does the Jain theory of seven predications (saptabhaṇgī) land them in self-contradiction, or help them to avoid it?
